import axios from"axios";var baseURL="http://localhost:3001/api";var http=axios.create({baseURL:baseURL,timeout:4000});//Tao mon hoc
export var createCourse=function createCourse(data){return http.post('/monhoc',data);};//Danh sach mon hoc
export var getCourses=function getCourses(){return http.get('/monhoc').then(function(res){return res.data;});};//Xoa 1 mon hoc
export var deleteCourse=function deleteCourse(mamh){return http.delete("/monhoc/".concat(mamh));};////Chi tiet mon hoc
//Thong tin chung
export var getCourseInfo=function getCourseInfo(mamh){return http.get("/monhoc/".concat(mamh)).then(function(res){return res.data;});};//Muc tieu
export var getCourseGoal=function getCourseGoal(mamh){return http.get("/monhoc/".concat(mamh,"/muctieu")).then(function(res){return res.data;});};export var createCourseGoal=function createCourseGoal(mamh,data){return http.post("/monhoc/".concat(mamh,"/muctieu"),data).then(function(res){return res.data;});};//Chuan dau ra
export var getCourseOutcome=function getCourseOutcome(mamh){return http.get("/monhoc/".concat(mamh,"/chuandaura")).then(function(res){return res.data;});};
